mean_cn: n. 断头台，截切机，切纸机，中止辩论；  v. 于断头台斩首，终止辩论将议案付诸表决
mean_en: a machine with a heavy blade that was used in the past to cut off the heads of people who had been sentenced to death
sentence: It must have been quite a scene for someone to lose their head in a guillotine.
sentence_trans: 有人在断头台掉脑袋，那肯定是个大场面。
